sentences.en: A knowledge of anatomy adds to the appreciation of works of art.
sentences.cn: 解剖学知识有助于提高对艺术作品的鉴赏力。

sentences.en: A knowledge to anatomy helpd to the appreciation of works of art.
sentences.cn: 解剖学知识有助于提高对艺术作品的鉴赏力.

sentences.en: He found out a great deal about the anatomy of animals.
sentences.cn: 在动物解剖学方面,他有过许多发现.

sentences.en: He had worked extensively on the anatomy of living animals.
sentences.cn: 他在活体解剖方面经验丰富。

sentences.en: He happened to be looking through the medical book "Gray's Anatomy" at the time.
sentences.cn: 那时，他正好在看医书《格雷氏解剖学》。

sentences.en: Physiology and anatomy are basic to medical science.
sentences.cn: 生理学和解剖学是医学的基础.

sentences.en: She talked glibly of anatomy and construction, planes and lines.
sentences.cn: 她滔滔不绝地谈着人体解剖和结构, 平面与线条.

sentences.en: The ball hit him excruciatingly in the most sensitive part of his anatomy.
sentences.cn: 球打在他身体最敏感的部位，让他疼痛不已。

sentences.en: The ball hit him in the most sensitive part of his anatomy.
sentences.cn: 球击中了他身上最敏感的部位。

sentences.en: the department of anatomy and physiology
The hurricane's anatomy was powerful and complex.
sentences.cn: 对飓风的剖析是一项庞大而复杂的工作.

sentences.en: This was a troubling essay on the anatomy of nationhood.
sentences.cn: 这是一篇剖析民族主义的让人不安的文章。

sentences.en: Various parts of his anatomy were clearly visible.
sentences.cn: 他身体的各个部分都看得很清楚.

sentences.en: We studied the anatomy of the snake.
sentences.cn: 我们研究了蛇的解剖结构.

words.tran_cn: 组织的；解剖学上的；结构上的
解剖的；解剖学的；结构上的

phrases.tran_cn: 解剖生理学；解剖学与生理学

trans.tran_cn: 解剖，分解，分析，（详细的）剖析，（生物体的）解剖结构，骨骼
trans.tran_en: the scientific study of the structure of human or animal bodies
